fields.name: Create Slideshow:
fields.value: Add a random ability from a higher-scoring target to your slidedeck.

fields.name: Next Slide:
fields.value: Name an ability from your slidedeck and grant it to a lower-scoring target.

fields.name: Gaining Experience (Charge 200%):
fields.value: Grant yourself an ability from your slidedeck.

fields.name: Zoom Meeting (2x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Use this ability, and you can use two other abilities simultaneously tonight.
